targets.rawSql:
set search_path to explore,public;

SELECT time, hll_cardinality(hll_union_agg(hll_gbifid)) AS total_records_cube1
FROM explore.gbif_aggregated
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
AND ST_intersects(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), concave)
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 WHERE NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$scientificname')), '') IS NULL)
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 WHERE NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$recordedby')), '') IS NULL)
AND EXISTS
( WITH a AS (
  select hll_cardinality(hll_union_agg(hll_gbifid)) AS bla
  from explore.gbif_aggregated
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND ST_intersects(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), concave)
) SELECT 1 FROM a WHERE bla >= 50000 )
GROUP BY 1

UNION ALL

SELECT time, count(*)
FROM explore.gbif_enriched
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
--AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 WHERE NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$scientificname')), '') IS NULL)
AND ST_contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), geom)
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 WHERE NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$scientificname')), '') IS NULL)
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 WHERE NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$recordedby')), '') IS NULL)
AND EXISTS
( WITH a AS (
  SELECT GREATEST(hll_cardinality(hll_union_agg(hll_gbifid)),0) AS bla
  FROM explore.gbif_aggregated
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND ST_intersects(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), concave)
) SELECT 1 FROM a WHERE bla < 50000 )
GROUP BY 1

UNION ALL

(SELECT time, count(*)
FROM explore.gbif_enriched
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
AND ST_contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), geom)
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 WHERE NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$scientificname')), '') IS NOT NULL)
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 WHERE NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$recordedby')), '') IS NULL)
AND tsv_scientificname @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$scientificname')
--AND tsv_recordedby @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$recordedby')
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC)

UNION ALL

(SELECT time, count(*)
FROM explore.gbif_enriched
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

AND tsv_recordedby @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$recordedby')
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC)

UNION ALL

(SELECT time, count(*)

WITH a AS (
SELECT * FROM explore.grouping5
WHERE
grouping_locality = CASE WHEN NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($locality)), '') is null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AND
--grouping_scientificname = CASE WHEN NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($scientificname)), '') is null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AND
grouping_scientificname = 0 AND
grouping_y = CASE WHEN NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($year)), '') is null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AND
grouping_m = CASE WHEN NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($month)), '') is null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
AND (scientificname IN ($scientificname) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($scientificname)), '') IS null)
AND (locality IN ($locality) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($locality)), '') IS null)
AND (y IN ($year) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($year)), '') IS null)
AND (m IN ($month) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($month)), '') IS null)
--AND $__timeFilter(make_date(y, m, '1'))\n--AND y is not null
--ORDER BY y,m,count
)
SELECT make_date(y,COALESCE(m,1),'1') AS time, count(distinct scientificname)
--hll_cardinality(hll_union_agg(distinct_scientificname)) 
FROM a
WHERE y is not null
--scientificname is not null
group by 1
order by 1;
--LIMIT 100;

WITH a AS (
SELECT scientificname, make_date(y,COALESCE(m,1),'1') AS time, sum(count) AS total FROM explore.grouping5 WHERE
grouping_locality = CASE WHEN NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($locality)), '') is null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AND
--grouping_scientificname = CASE WHEN NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($scientificname)), '') is null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AND
grouping_scientificname = 0 AND
grouping_y = CASE WHEN NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($year)), '') is null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AND
grouping_m = CASE WHEN NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($month)), '') is null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
AND (scientificname IN ($scientificname) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($scientificname)), '') IS null)
AND (locality IN ($locality) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($locality)), '') IS null)
AND (y IN ($year) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($year)), '') IS null)
AND (m IN ($month) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($month)), '') IS null)
GROUP BY 1,2
--ORDER BY time ASC
), b as (
SELECT scientificname, total, time, row_number() OVER w as rownumber
FROM a
WINDOW w as (PARTITION BY time ORDER BY total desc))
SELECT time, scientificname, total FROM b
WHERE rownumber < 4
AND scientificname is not null
AND time is not null;
